Details.Textbox24: Beginning with calendar year 2010, Qualcomm is reporting emissions for our North American facilities. Beginning with calendar year 2014, Qualcomm is reporting emissions for our global facilities and scope 3 global employee business travel. Qualcomm considers our North American 2014 Scope 1 & 2 emissions reported in CRIS to be our "baseline" year. The Worldwide inventory is complete beginning with CY2016 reporting.
Details.Textbox41: 5775 Morehouse Drive Attention: Director, Sustainability, Gail Welch, Bldg A-232G San Diego, California US

Total kwhrs = 10,945,700.

Source Emissions | Purchased Electricity - Market Based total India.N usage is 6,145,700 kwhrs. Note:Wind Purchases are 4,800,000 kwhrs. BESCOM Grid purchases are 1,345,000 kwhrs, recorded in this entry, which when multiplied by the emission factor of 0.000856 metric tCO2 per kwhr = 1,152 metric tCO2. Take conservative approach and claim all 10,945,700vkwhrs using full India EF until we can verify we have environmental rights for the wind purchases.

Source Emissions | Purchased Wind Energy Kwhrs - Market Based Wind energy purchases are zero emissions - Note: need to confirm we have environmental rights in our contract so that we can claim zero emissions. For now, conservative approach is to use full India EF for 100% of kwhrs used in CY2016 for both location and market based emissions calcs for India.N
